name: Narukami's Joy
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  Those who belong to the Shogunate Commissions are those who administer andexercise power. In the monster-filled tales of the ancient past, those whowere deeply trusted by the Shogun would bear talismans with this hooked designon their person, and just as the word "commission" means to "joyfully serve"in the old tongue, those who received her favor would return it with love andloyalty. Yet, after a certain point in time, nothing would be as it wasbefore.
